hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was brought some milk mixed with water. On his right there was a Bedouin and on his left was Abu Bakr. He drank some, then he gave it to the Bedouin and said:“Pass it around to the right.”

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا شَرِبَ أَعْطَى الأَيْمَنَ فَالأَيْمَنَ
chapter.eng-name: When drinking, the (vessel) should be passed around to the right
